fields.fieldTitle: Name of the Master Class Presenter

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Russell Brunson, Jim Edwards, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the topic of your Master Class in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: potato guns, email marketing, marketing funnels, relieve joint pain, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your Opportunity Switch Headline / Title?

fieldHint.hint1: Use Funnel Scripts (Click Here)=> Opportunity Switch Headline / Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: How To Quickly & Safely Build Your Own High-Powered Potato Gun Without Spending a Ton Of Time or Money To Make It, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the Purpose of your Master Class and how will it help your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: "The Purpose of this class is to _____." (Multi-line Bulleted List. Hit ENTER for each list item)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Help you build an awesome spud gun ; Use it safely ; Trick it out for extra distance ; Have loads of fun doing it, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your background story as it relates to your Master Class?

fieldHint.hint1: OPTION: Create Story using Funnel Scripts (Click Here)=> Epiphany Bridge Script

fieldHint.hint2: Enter bullet outline of your story here. Hit ENTER for each new list item, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 thing they want to learn how to do from this Master Class?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: how to build an awesome potato gun, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the big picture payoff they should expect from your Master Class?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: how to safely make a potato gun at home using inexpensive parts, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 benefit of your Master Class? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: "You will discover how to _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: launch a potato further than you ever dreamed possible, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #2 benefit of your Master Class? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: "You will be able to _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: enjoy hours of exciting, relaxing, inexpensive fun, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #3 benefit of your Master Class? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: "You will also _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get hands on experience with the laws of physics, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is one more Cool "how to" secret you'll drop on them in your Master Class?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: how to launch your potato 25% farther with one simple tweak, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What will you call each "chunk" of your Master Class Presentation? (SINGULAR)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Tip; Trick; Secret; Module; Chapter; Part; Unit; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the title of your first chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to Decide Which Type of potato Gun You Want to Create

fieldHint.hint2: Expert Secrets, pp. 78-79

fields.fieldTitle: What points, questions, topics will you cover in this first chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Brainstorm everything you want to cover for this chunk

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: What's a pneumatic gun?; What size gun should we build?; How do you build a bolt-action spud gun?; etc.) *(Multi-line Bulleted List. Hit ENTER for each new list item

fields.fieldTitle: What is the compelling "sales copy" description of your first chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Why the type of gun you choose is critical based on your space, distance and safety

fieldHint.hint2: (Expert Secrets, pp. 79-80)

fields.fieldTitle: What is the title of your second chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to Pick the Right Pipes

fieldHint.hint2: (Expert Secrets, pp. 78-79)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: What type of pipe do you use?; Do the PSI ratings on the pipes matter?; etc.

fieldHint.hint3: *(Multi-line Bulleted List. Hit ENTER for each new list item)

fields.fieldTitle: What is the compelling "sales copy" description of your second chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Discover the only pipe we will ever use AND the secret PSI rating that will guarantee your potatoes go farther and your gun lasts longer.

fieldHint.hint2: Expert Secrets, pp. 79-80

fields.fieldTitle: What is the title of your third chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to Find Accessories Before You Start Building

fields.fieldTitle: What is the compelling "sales copy" description of your third chunk?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Find out which igniter we'll NEVER use (and hear about a scary near-death experience that kept us from ever using it again), and why there is only one brand we trust.

fieldHint.hint2: Expert Secrets, pp. 79-80

fields.fieldTitle: What is the title of your fourth chunk?
